Articles.Content:
Just got a 505 error a minute ago.

How many 50(Int) errors are there?
I'm assuming the game will release at 04:00 UTC since that's when the streams end.

Yeah pages are loading incredibly slow for me too, sometimes upwards of a minute.

nice job team.

That's squad for ya. "Hey guys, 1.0 will come out on Monday!"

"What time?!"

"We're not telling!"
How long has the main site been down?

That's squad for ya. "Hey guys, 1.0 will come out on Monday!"

"What time?!"

"We're not telling!"

That's actually normal for game companies.

*might possibly* be today

might

ANYTHING IS POSSIBLE

Or maybe at midnight..
I just hope today, tomorrow i have to retake a 3 hour test after school so i'll be home in time for bible study, then head home, eat, then go to bed..

This is sooo cooolll. I have never been so exited about a game before!

Also the nose cone is has been repaired thanks to magical eagles. AHEAD AT FULL SPEED!
I knew the hype train would go crazy close to the release. I did not expect it to happen over 8 hours before the earliest possible release time.

That's actually normal for game companies.

Normally squad doesn't even announce the day. Heck, when someone would say "when is a release coming out?" They would push it back a day.*

*Not fully backed up by evidence
The hype is real...

I knew the hype train would go crazy close to the release. I did not expect it to happen over 8 hours before the earliest possible release time.

It's always possible they could drop it early, but I doubt it. I would expect it to be closer to 11PM Monday than 1AM Monday.

patcher won't start even... it has the binaries for the thing so why won't it launch?

i don't know

patcher won't start even... it has the binaries for the thing so why won't it launch?

i don't know

They are doing maintenance on the store website, possibly related.
I've just noticed a slight burning sensation between my toes..

T - 7 minutes until launch

http://www.videocorner.tv/videocorner2/live_flv/index.php?langue=en#.VT1BASGqhBc

Riddled with unfinished bugs just hours before release?

No, it's about what seems to be some accidental launcher update.

Also as Totally Not A Dictator President for Life Renegrade, I hereby proclaim that missing a release date is punishable by the most dire punishment possible (having to fetch a shrubbery, or maybe having to cut down the biggest tree in the forest with a herring...or BOTH!). Chop, chop!

See, I told you...It's still going isn't it?
Wait, wasn't there a countdown that someone found in the kerbal countdown that seemed unreleased to KSP besides the fact that it counted down to Monday? Where is that now?

Less trolling, moar releasing!

In the Free Republic of Renegradia (created early this afternoon), it is officially 11:59pm on Monday, April 27th. Squad has exactly 60 seconds to avoid being late~

Also as Totally Not A Dictator President for Life Renegrade, I hereby proclaim that missing a release date is punishable by the most dire punishment possible (having to fetch a shrubbery, or maybe having to cut down the biggest tree in the forest with a herring...or BOTH!). Chop, chop!

Ni! Ni!

See, I told you...It's still going isn't it?
